meanings.definition: The act of making something resistant to bombs.
meanings.sent1: The bombproofing of the building saved many lives during the explosion.
meanings.sent2: Engineers used bombproofing to protect the military base from enemy attacks.
meanings.sent3: The bombproofing of the bunker was so effective that even the walls remained intact.
meanings.sent4: The bombproofing of the safe was like a shield against any potential danger.
meanings.sent5: The bombproofing of the vehicle made it feel like a fortress on wheels.

meanings.definition: The process of reinforcing a structure to withstand explosions.
meanings.sent1: The bombproofing of the bridge ensured it could endure any blast.
meanings.sent2: The old castle underwent bombproofing to protect it from modern warfare.
meanings.sent3: The bombproofing of the house made it look like a secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: The bombproofing of the dam was crucial to prevent any catastrophic damage.
meanings.sent5: The bombproofing of the tunnel made it feel like a secure passage through danger.
